did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Reprints, and notes, reports, and other items primarily relating to the San Francisco Community Renewal Program.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Ira Miles Robinson is Professor of Urban Planning, Faculty of Environmental Design, University of Calgary. He also served as Professor of City and Regional Planning and Director of the Graduate Program of Urban and Regional Planning, University of Southern California, 1965-1974, and as Senior Staff Member, Arthur D. Little, Inc., San Francisco, 1961-1965.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Reprints, and notes, reports, and other items primarily relating to the San Francisco Community Renewal Program.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ira M. Robinson. Papers, #4420. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
